movie.title: One Under the Sun
movie.description_intro: Astronaut Kathryn Voss, sole survivor of a disastrous space mission, is desperate to reunite with her terminally ill daughter but becomes a fugitive when the government discovers she's returned to earth with an extraordinary gift to save earth.
movie.description_full: Astronaut Kathryn Voss, sole survivor of a disastrous space mission, is desperate to reunite with her terminally ill daughter but becomes a fugitive when the government discovers she's returned to earth with an extraordinary gift to save earth.

movies.title: The Klatos Paradox
movies.summary: An incompetent time traveler must team up with his unpredictable alternate self, to fix a paradox which is now slowly destroying the universe.
movies.description_full: An incompetent time traveler must team up with his unpredictable alternate self, to fix a paradox which is now slowly destroying the universe.
movies.synopsis: An incompetent time traveler must team up with his unpredictable alternate self, to fix a paradox which is now slowly destroying the universe.

movies.title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
movies.summary: Extreme athlete turned government operative Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) comes out of self-imposed exile, thought to be long dead, and is set on a collision course with deadly alpha warrior Xiang (Donnie Yen) and his team in a race to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's Box. Recruiting an all-new group of thrill-seeking cohorts, Xander finds himself enmeshed in a deadly conspiracy that points to collusion at the highest levels of world governments.

movies.title: White Lily
movies.summary: Tokiko is a famous ceramist who gives workshops at home. Haruka is her assistant student and lover who lives with her. However, Tokiko's instructions are rather specific and Haruka is obliged to blindly trust her teacher. Haruka lays down the methods of her teacher and everything goes well until Tokiko accepts a young male student, Satoru.

movies.title: Ghost of Camp Blood
movies.summary: Infamous Blackwood Forest is still haunted by the numerous deaths at the hands of a masked clown killer, but now, it's haunted by something else. The vengeful spirit of the recently deceased Camp Blood Killer is out for revenge from beyond the grave.
